article: It's cold in winter. But it is also  _  for many exciting sports; skating, skiing and sledding . It is hard to skate and ski, but sledding doesn't need  _  . Now some sleds are made of glass, so they can move  _  . In the old days, in some very  _  parts of the world, people  _  sleds to pull goods or people. Now sleds are used for exercising. After standing on a sled and kicking the ground, you can  _  the sled. Or you can ask a person  _  help. Another sled is called skeleton sled . It is  _  .
